meanings.definition: Of, relating to, or denoting a hormone that has effect only in the vicinity of the gland secreting it.
meanings.sent1: The paracrine hormone affected only the nearby cells.
meanings.sent2: The paracrine signaling helped regulate local functions.
meanings.sent3: The paracrine message whispered secrets to the neighboring cells.
meanings.sent4: The paracrine influence stayed close like a guardian angel.
meanings.sent5: The paracrine impact was like a gentle breeze, felt only nearby.

meanings.definition: A substance that acts as a paracrine hormone.
meanings.sent1: The paracrine was released by the gland to communicate locally.
meanings.sent2: The paracrine played a crucial role in cell-to-cell communication.
meanings.sent3: The paracrine acted like a messenger delivering news to nearby cells.
meanings.sent4: The paracrine functioned as a local mediator, keeping things in balance.
meanings.sent5: The paracrine worked quietly, influencing only the immediate surroundings.
